statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

statistics.name: offensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the offense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot.

article.headline: S. Utah 87, Oakland 85
article.story: CEDAR CITY, Utah (AP) -- Justin Allen hit a buzzer-beating 3-pointer while falling out of bounds to give Southern Utah an 87-85 overtime win over Oakland on Saturday night. Standing in front of the Oakland bench with three seconds on the clock, Allen cut across the court and caught Orlando Griego's inbounds pass on the run just short of midcourt. He dribbled around two Grizzly defenders, tight-roping the left sideline, and lost his balance as he released the game-winning 20-foot jumper, a split-second before the horn sounded. Griego and Steve Barnes led the Thunderbirds (16-11, 6-6 Mid-Continent) with 16 points each. Allen scored 15 points, while Nurudeen Adepoju had 14 and Swaney Cooper added 13. Barnes had seven assists. Vova Severovas scored 25 points to lead Oakland (15-13, 8-4), whose five starters each scored in double figures. Derick Nelson, Shawn Hopes and Johnathon Jones scored 15 points each for the Grizzles, and Erik Kangas added 10. Hopes grabbed eight rebounds. Barnes forced overtime with a 16-foot jumper that tied the game at 79 with 33.5 seconds left. Oakland's Rick Billings and Barnes traded 3-pointers in the first minute of overtime before Severovas and Griego each hit two free throws. Hopes made the front end of a two-shot foul to give the Grizzlies an 85-84 lead with 40 seconds left, and Oakland grabbed the rebound of the second shot. The Grizzlies called timeout with 16.8 seconds on the game clock and 12 seconds on the shot clock. Southern Utah then forced a shot-clock violation, setting the stage for Allen's game-winner.
